entries.abort: Redirect! Redirect! We have lost our mission leader. Requesting assistance...
entries.angry_disable: You will never defeat the Ghrag fighting clan!
entries.arrival_phase_1: We have detected the Corellian corvette and its Ghrag mercenary escorts coming out of hyperspace...
entries.arrival_phase_2: The Corvette and its Ghrag escorts are in this system! Engage and disable the Corvette so our friends can re-take the bridge!
entries.capture_complete: The engineers have made it to the bridge!
entries.capture_phase_1: The crew have their hands on a few weapons. They're making our way to the bridge now...
entries.capture_phase_2: The engineers at the door to the bridge... the engineer's mate will disable the locks...
entries.capture_started: The chief engineer and few hands from the engine room are all we have aboard to re-take the vessel...
entries.complete: The engineering crew has recaptured the Corellian Corvette!
entries.escort_remaining: Ghrag fighter destroyed! There are %DI ships remaining.
entries.failed_destroy: The Corvette starship was destroyed. Mission Failed!
entries.failed_escape: The Ghrag have slipped through our fingers...
entries.panic_1: We're rebuilding the navicomputer system. You can handle the fighters, right?
entries.panic_2: Don't let them shear the remote interlock! I just fixed that!
entries.panic_3: Will these Ghrag ever give up?!
entries.panic_5: We got incoming! Take them down!
entries.quest_disable_d: Target the Corvette's sub-systems and destroy each of them. Destroy all turrets and shield generators - then destroy either the main reactor or the engine. When the starship is disabled, pcontrast3 Rian Ry pcontrast1 will send a coded signal to the small crew of engineers left aboard the vessel. They will try to re-take the bridge.
entries.quest_escort_d: The engineers have successfully re-taken the starship! Escort the vessel to the Kashyyyk Space Station. Protect it against Ghrag Mercenary attacks!
entries.quest_escort_t: Escort the Corvette to the Kashyyyk Space Station
entries.quest_location_d: The Ghrag have paid-off an Alliance starship engineer to steal a Corellian Corvette. They will use it to defeat Civilian Protectors throughout the galaxy unless you disable the starship and help the crew re-take the bridge.
entries.quest_recover_d: Rian has contacted the handful of Alliance engineers aboard the vessel. They must now fight their way to the bridge and take command. Protect the vessel from incoming Ghrag fighters!
entries.recovery_success: The recovery operation has been a success!
entries.target_disabled: The starship is disabled. I'll alert the engineering crew so they can take back the bridge!
entries.taunt_1: Hey! Hey! This starship doesn't belong to you anymore!
entries.taunt_2: We stole this vessel fair and square!
entries.taunt_3: You again! This is the LAST time you interfere!
entries.taunt_4: Now it is time for us to take revenge!
entries.taunt_5: You cannot defeat the Ghrag mercenaries!
entries.thanks_1: Now that's good shooting, my friend! Keep it up!
entries.thanks_2: Excellent! You keep them off us and we'll keep this thing flying!
entries.thanks_3: Good shooting! From our side - I can report most internal systems still functional...
entries.thanks_4: Hey! Scanner's working... it says all enemies eliminated? Does that sound right to you?
entries.thanks_5: Tactical computer indicates... well, that's actually still broken. I don't see any more bad-guys, though!
entries.title: Stolen Corvette - Prevent a Corellian Corvette from being used against the Civilian Protection Guild
entries.title_d: A lowly engineer working at a hidden Rebel shipyard has turned traitor! He has stolen a Corellian Corvette and plans to deliver it to our enemies, the Ghrag Mercenary Clan. A small group of Rebel engineers are still aboard, though... Disable the starship so this small crew can attempt to re-take the bridge!
